text: Nandagopaalante Kusruthikal is a 1996 Indian Malayalam film directed by Nissar and starring Mukesh and Chembakam in the lead roles.http://www.malayalacinema.com/userreview_nandagopalnte-kusruthikal-.htm ==Cast== * Mukesh as Nandagopalan * Chembakam * Innocent * KPAC Lalitha * Rajan P Dev * Harishree Ashokan * Paravoor Bharathan * Biyon ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Nandagopaalante Kusruthikal
